name: Marlon Thompson
location: Flat 6 Osier Grove Estate, Dalston, London
personality_sketch: Marlon is an energetic and sociable young man who enjoys spending time with friends and exploring the local music scene in Dalston. He has a keen interest in fashion and often spends his day off visiting thrift stores and markets. While he is ambitious about moving up in his career, he currently values the flexibility his job offers.
